howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: A structured 6-phase process to ensure the success of your automation project.

step1.description: We identify repetitive tasks and bottlenecks in your current operations.

step2.title: Solution Design
step2.description: We create a customized automation architecture for your business.

step3.title: Agent Development

step4.title: Integration

step5.title: Testing and Optimization

step6.title: Deployment and Support

faq.title: Frequently
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about AI automation.
faq.q1: How long does it take to implement an AI agent?
faq.a1: Implementation time varies depending on project complexity. A basic WhatsApp agent can be operational in 2-4 weeks, while a more complex automation solution may require 6-12 weeks. During the initial consultation, we provide a detailed timeline for your specific case.
faq.q2: Do I need technical knowledge to use the solution?
faq.a2: No, our solutions are designed to be used by non-technical staff. We provide an intuitive interface to manage and monitor agents, plus complete training for your team. Technical support is included to resolve any questions.
faq.q3: How does it integrate with my current systems?
faq.a3: Our AI agents integrate with most business systems: CRM (Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive), ERP, e-commerce platforms, ticketing systems, and more. We use standard APIs and develop custom connectors when necessary.
faq.q4: What security and privacy guarantees do you offer?
faq.a4: All our solutions comply with GDPR and LOPDGDD. We implement end-to-end encryption, secure storage on European servers, and strict access controls. We sign confidentiality agreements and can adapt to specific security requirements for your sector.
faq.q5: What happens if the agent doesn't know how to answer something?
faq.a5: Agents are designed to automatically escalate to a human when they detect queries outside their scope or when the user requests it. Additionally, the system continuously learns from these interactions to improve future responses.
faq.q6: What is the maintenance cost after implementation?
faq.a6: We offer monthly maintenance plans that include: 24/7 monitoring, security updates, performance adjustments, and technical support. The typical cost is between 10-15% of the initial project value per year, although it varies depending on the scope of service required.
faq.noAnswer: Can't find the answer you're looking for?
